name: The Oathkeeper
description:
SUMMARY:


This is an old-school 2D RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes.

Ira is a famed mercenary, known for never breaking a contract he is called The Oathkeeper. When one of his contracts puts him in the middle of an ancient war of good versus evil and face to face with the woman he begins to fall in love with, he will have to start fighting for more than just money, and using his word for a greater good and a much greater sacrifice.

FEATURES:


Classical Storyline
Sidequests to complete
Quest Journal to keep track of your progress
Mouse Support
Beautiful battle system that makes you feel in the battle yourself
Beautiful and dynamic locations to explore
